name.ja: <ruby>双<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>焔<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby><ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby>ルナエル

effect.en: If you have another face-up Level 10 FIRE Attribute monster on your field, face-up monsters on your opponent's field lose 1000 ATK/DEF. If you have 3 or more Maximum Monsters in your Graveyard, your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards when your Level 10 FIRE Attribute monsters declare attacks.

ritual_spell: Altar of the Twin Blaze Fiends
